electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: lower Hunter Valley; it includes the centres of Boolaroo, Cardiff, Cooranbong, Edgeworth, Elermore Vale, Fletcher, Minmi, Morisset, Speers Point, Toronto, Wangi Wangi, and parts of Wallsend and Warners Bay.
Industries: light and heavy engineering, timber, textiles, some dairy farms and poultry farming, tourism, coal-mining, electricity and retailing.
State electorates: Charlton includes the New South Wales Legislative Assembly electorate of Lake Macquarie, and parts of Cessnock, Charlestown and Wallsend.
